text: Agar pas az rance, ki ʙa inson rasida, rahmate ʙa u ʙicasonem, sukri Alloh namekunad, ʙalki gunoh karda megujad: «In haqqi man ast va ʙovar nadoram, ki qijomat ʙarpo savad. Va agar ham maro nazdi Parvardigoram ʙargardonand, alʙatta nazdi U holate xustar (cannate ʙarojam) ʙosad». Pas, hatman, kofironro ruzi qijomat ʙa a'mole, ki kardaand, ogoh mekunem va ʙa onho azoʙi saxte mecasonem
